lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Prime Minister Branko Mikulic on Monday proposed new taxes hitting high income earners, moonlighters, property and interest on savings as part of new government plans to rein in the country's 123 pct inflation.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Further details of the program, which Mikulic summarised in Parliament, are to appear in the days ahead, and the draft has to be debated and voted on by deputies in November.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Zoran Popov, senior research fellow at The Belgrade Institute for Industrial Economy said the existing system made many of the proposals difficult to put into effect.
